title: Vegtral Restaurace
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar and restaurant opened in Jan 2013. Offers a varied and mostly vegetarian meals with a few meat ones. Many dishes can be prepared vegan, and some gluten free. Sample dishes include seitan sandwich, portobello mushroom burger, burrito, curry and rice, pasta, and salads.
